structured_data.professional_summary: Sanjaykumar Ganatra is an accomplished IT professional with over 17 years of experience delivering business intelligence and analytical solutions across diverse industries, including insurance, finance, telecom, HR, and energy. He is highly skilled in data engineering, data modeling, AWS cloud technologies, and data visualization tools, such as Tableau and Spotfire. Sanjaykumar has consistently demonstrated his ability to extract actionable insights for executives and teams, enhancing decision-making capabilities and driving meaningful business outcomes. Notably, he has played a pivotal role in optimizing insurance claim tracking and successfully migrating complex reporting systems to align with advanced data pipeline structures.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed Tableau dashboards for executives, managers, and analysts to track key insurance claim metrics.
• Assisted in creating the data layer for reporting.
• Automated conversion of HQL scripts to Spark format using Azure Databricks, ensuring production readiness through data comparison.
• Successfully migrated over 500 scripts to production.
• Transitioned 30+ Tableau reports in the HPE Phase 2 project to align with the new pipeline structure.
• Implemented Python-based utilities to extract metadata from Tableau files for process improvement.
• Optimized Tableau licensing and maintained a centralized metadata repository.
Technologies: Tableau, Azure Databricks, Python, HQL, Spark

• Collaborated with stakeholders to address analytical challenges and documented data lineage for solutions.
• Developed interactive Tableau dashboards for the Finance team, reducing cash collection time by 80% and maximizing revenue.
• Integrated Adobe Analytics and Salesforce data into the data warehouse to generate decision-making insights.
• Performed exploratory data analysis using Python and prepared data for machine learning models.
• Created a Spotfire-based Decommission Dashboard, reducing presentation efforts by 95%.
• Designed star schemas for OBIEE and created RPDs based on customer requirements.
• Built data pipelines, transformations, and reporting infrastructures using Informatica, Talend, AWS Aurora, S3, Athena, Tableau, and Spotfire.
• Integrated heterogeneous data sources into the enterprise data warehouse and applied data quality rules.

• Met data ingestion and reporting requirements for a talent management platform.
• Implemented OBIA HR analytics (version 7.9.6.3) with OBIEE 11g, Informatica, DAC, and Oracle Database.
• Extracted PeopleSoft transactional data into OBIEE's Oracle data warehouse using Informatica.
• Developed strategic scorecards tailored to product requirements.

skills: Big Data (HDFS, Hive, Impala, Apache Spark)
Cloud (S3, AWS Aurora, Athena, Glue Catalog, Azure Data services)

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified Azure Data Scientist Associate
Python for Data Science and Machine Learning Bootcamp

years_exp: 17 years of experience in Business Intelligence and Data Engineering
profile:
Sanjaykumar Ganatra is a seasoned IT professional with over 17 years of experience in delivering impactful business intelligence and analytics solutions across industries such as insurance, finance, telecom, HR, and energy. His expertise spans data engineering, cloud technologies, and advanced visualization tools like Tableau and Spotfire, enabling organizations to make data-driven decisions that drive tangible business outcomes. Sanjaykumar has a proven track record of optimizing complex data pipelines, including successfully transitioning 30+ Tableau reports to new pipeline structures and automating HQL script conversions to Spark format using Azure Databricks.

Currently serving as a Senior Big Data Analytics Engineer at CGI, Sanjaykumar has demonstrated his ability to create executive-level dashboards that monitor key insurance metrics and streamline claim tracking processes. His earlier roles at Tata Consultancy Services and Infosys further cement his versatility, as he developed interactive Tableau dashboards that accelerated revenue collection and implemented HR analytics platforms tailored to organizational needs. With certifications such as Tableau Certified Desktop Associate, Databricks Certified Data Engineer Associate, and AWS Data Analytics Specialty, he is well-equipped to address complex analytical challenges using cutting-edge technologies.

Sanjaykumar holds a Master’s degree in Technology & Science from Birla Institute and a Bachelor’s degree in Electronics & Communication from Sardar Patel University. Fluent in English, Gujarati, and Hindi, he combines technical mastery with strategic thinking to deliver innovative solutions. Recognized with the CGI Hall of Fame award, his dedication to excellence and problem-solving approach continue to redefine business intelligence and data engineering standards.

Created and optimized the data layer for reporting.
Automated script conversion from HQL to Spark using Azure Databricks and ensured production readiness through data comparisons.
Transitioned 30+ Tableau reports to align with new pipeline structures in the HPE Phase 2 project.
Implemented Python utilities to extract metadata from Tableau files for process improvements.
Optimized Tableau licensing and maintained centralized metadata repositories.
